name: War Table
description:
A strategy game on a 4x4 grid. This is a rapidly made Prototype to test out an idea for a card games combat system. The game is meant to play more like a board game such as chess, checkers, or Go; rather than a TCG. Essentially I wanted to make a more complex version of the children's card game "War".

The game is played by dragging and dropping cards onto the grid with the mouse. I suggest reading the How To Play in the game to know how each card functions when you place it on the board.

Each players deck is identical, containing:

  • 2 Wizards
  • 2 Jesters
  • 2 Captains
  • 4 Assassins
  • 4 Knights
  • 6 Bards
  • 10 Archers
  • 10 Soldiers

The art used in the cards are merely placeholder.

Background Music is Half Past by The Hamster Alliance. He does awesome work.
